import math
def ncr(n,r):
    f=math.factorial
    return f(n)/(f(r)*f(n-r))
def main():
    t=int(input())
    while t>0:
        l=[]
        for i in range (0,100):
            l.append(0)    
        ar=map(int,raw_input().split())
        for i in range (0,11):
            l[ar[i]-1]=l[ar[i]-1]+1
        k=int(input())
        ans=1
        while k>0:
        	i=99
        	while i>=0:
        		if l[i]!=0:
        			if k>l[i]:
        				k=k-l[i]
        			else:
        				ans=ans*(ncr(l[i],k))
        				k=0
        				break
        		i=i-1
        print ans
        t=t-1
    return 0
main()
